Japan: Cholera epidemic and extreme impoverishment in now Shiga Prefecture have resulted in the Shocho uprising.
Nepal: Yakshamalla reigns – height of united Malla kingdom (to 1482)
Vietnam: Lê Lợi was declared emperor of an independent Đại Việt. The Bình Ngô đại cáo was published, affirming that Đại Việt was independent from and equal to China.
